Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_set_3D_speaker_type

The function AIL_set_3D_speaker_type sets the type of speaker system that the 3D provider should use.

void AIL_set_3D_speaker_type(
  HPROVIDER provider,
  S32 speaker_type
);

In Parameters

provider
indicates the provider to set.
speaker_type
indicates type of speaker system. It can be one of the MILES_SPEAKER_TYPE constants.

Discussion

Now-a-days, you usually don't need to call this function because the sound hardware vendors all provide a system-wide way to control the speaker settings.

Different providers use the speaker setting in different ways. Some use the speaker type to switch to completely different spacializing algorithms, some do nothing at all. The speaker type functions are not supported on Xbox, as this setting is handled on a system-wide basis and is not application controllable.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C
